title: Interpretation of a chain in a dream: Seeing chains in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a dream chain of gold and silver for a married woman, for a single woman, for Ibn Sirin, for a pregnant woman, for a girl is to tie her neck with an iron chain. Interpretation of the symbol of chains in a dream: The chain in a dream indicates committing a sin or major sin, as God Almighty says in a precise revelation from Surat Al-Insan. : “Indeed, We have prepared chains and chains for the unbelievers and flames.” The chain around a man’s neck indicates a tyrannical or oppressive woman. Whoever sees that he is tied with a chain will face sadness and sorrow in the future. Similar to wearing a rusty chain in a dream are problems, setbacks, or psychological torment. A rusty chain also indicates that you are facing financial or living difficulties. It expresses wrong feelings or negative thoughts. The chain intended for binding is not like the chain intended for decoration, because the attachment chain expresses the fortuneteller’s worries and problems. A beautiful chain designed for decoration because it expresses luck or a new opportunity in life. If it is made of gold, it indicates important and enjoyable news. Without It is pleasant in a dream for an unmarried girl to wear a chain made of iron, copper, or cheap or forged metal. If a girl sees that she is receiving a gold chain from someone she knows, this means good news in the future. The gold chain can represent marriage if the girl sees herself buying it or putting it on her arm. Or her neck or her wrist. The chain in a married woman’s dream deserves praise if she sees that she is adorned with it. It is long if she sees that the chain connects her wrist or her feet. It is praiseworthy in a dream that she buys gold chains, because they express the goodness of children. Chains of actions that indicate goodness and generosity for daughters if a married woman sees That she has a silver chain, it means her good livelihood. If she sees that her chain has changed from silver to pure gold, it portends an imminent pregnancy or she will meet a dear person who has been absent for a long time or separation. A married woman sees in her dream that her husband is bound with chains and shackles, this is her interpretation of difficulties Possession, struggle, or work. If the chain that appears in a pregnant woman’s dream is of gold, it indicates a boy. If the chain is made of silver, this most likely means that the woman has given birth. Chains in general in a pregnant woman’s dreams are considered good news, as it is advisable to buy and wear them. As well as giving it to the husband or children. Long chains indicate longevity or abundant nutrition, while long chains indicate health or happiness. An exception to this interpretation is chains of restriction and imprisonment, as well as shackles. A chain in a man’s dream indicates a woman in general. Chains that adorn a man’s chest or neck are particularly disturbing. It symbolizes following one's whims and desires. It can indicate escaping after evil and taboos. It is praiseworthy in a dream for a man to see his wife or daughter wearing a beautiful gold or silver chain. The chain around the neck of the deceased indicates trust or will, and this will is often addressed to the monarch and relates to his livelihood. Or his family. The dead person who appears in a dream chained expresses his sin or disobedience before his death. He is a mother.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting my daughter’s hair in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting my daughter’s hair? A question asked by many mothers who have had this dream before. Seeing women's hair cut in general is an annoying sight for some of them due to their preference for long hair over short hair, and it is a strange sight, especially for those who prefer shaving to changing. However, this dream has many interpretations that differ between dreamers, men and women. Is this dream promising for girls and indicating goodness and happiness, or is it a sign of sadness, anxiety, or a warning of a problem for him? We will learn the answer to this question in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about cutting my daughter’s hair. The dream interpreter Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing cut hair in a dream generally indicates the dreamer’s desire to get rid of everything that restricts him. With good relations. A mother who sees her daughter cutting her hair in a dream is a sign of fulfilling trust and paying off debts, and God knows best. This vision also symbolizes for girls as evidence of the girl’s desire to make a positive change in her life, as well as a sign of high self-confidence. If the mother sees that the shape of her hair Her daughter may get worse after shaving, so this vision expresses getting rid of a reprehensible characteristic of this girl. In the case of cutting hair in a dream accompanied by crying, this vision symbolizes the worries and problems that the girl suffers from in reality. Seeing her hair being cut in a dream by someone indicates It is strange that she suffers from the restrictions of those around her. This vision brings to girls other interpretations between good and bad visions, the most important of which is the ability to take responsibility, beyond the crises and problems they face in reality, in addition to the approaching wedding date. , or a sign of the loss of loved ones. We present to you the most prominent interpretations of girls cutting hair in a dream. title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing the dead crying in a dream

preview.html: A dead man crying in a dream. There is no doubt that seeing the dead conveys a kind of anxiety and fear to the heart, and the crying of the dead raises anticipation and doubt, both the details of the vision and the form of crying, and in this article we take into account all indicators and cases in more detail and explanation. A dead man crying in a dream A dream about seeing death or a dead person is one of the visions that express the many fears and pressures that surround the viewer and torment him from within. Whoever sees that he is dying may fall into neglect or turmoil or in his heart. He dies from many sins and misdeeds, and the vision indicates repentance, guidance, and a return to guidance. Whoever sees the dead person crying, this indicates bad calamity, futility of work, and stagnation in efforts and actions. If the dead person cries and returns to life, this indicates renewal of hopes, revival of faded desires, and salvation from worries and obstacles. The crying of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of seeing the dead does not need interpretation, but rather relates to the condition of the dead person, his appearance, and what he also does. Singing and dancing are not counted and are invalidated because the dead person is burned. Whoever sees the dead person crying, this vision is a warning to the pioneer and a reminder of his future, and that he knows the truth of the world, realizes what he lacks in his mind, and returns to his feelings. And justice, and if the dead person is known, his rights are denied, and his failure to pray and give alms may be for his soul. If the dead person cries and is sad, this indicates the misbehavior of his family and relatives, their shortcomings in his right, and their forgetting to remember him and visit him from time to time, but if the dead person cries and screams. And he cries, this indicates someone who reminds him of his mistake or belittles him for not paying him back what he owes in this world. The dead crying in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq says: If the dead person cries, this is evidence of sadness and remorse for the sins he has missed, and he acknowledges his actions and sins and asks for forgiveness and forgiveness. The dreamer is a reminder of the rights of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. He finished with his family and the importance of praying for him for mercy, forgiveness, and zakat. Whoever sees a dead person knowing that he is crying, this indicates the difficult circumstances and crises that the dreamer is going through and needs help and support to overcome them. If the dead person is sad and crying, this is evidence of someone who reminds him of evil and deals with him with reprehensible words. If the dead person cries and rebukes the dreamer, this indicates staying away from sin and error, and staying away from inner temptations and parts of suspicion. A dead person crying in a dream for an unmarried woman. Seeing death symbolizes fear, dread, and worry about something, and she may lose hope, and sadness and despair take over her heart, and anxiety and pain increase. Inside it. And if you see the dead person crying and you know him, this indicates asking for a prayer for mercy, overcoming past mistakes, and giving charity to his soul, and if you see the deceased father crying, this indicates a feeling of sadness and anxiety. And asking for help and her need for support. And if she sees an unknown dead person crying, then this vision expresses a lesson from the past, the beginning, realizing the facts that she ignores, returning to her senses, abandoning guilt and resisting the desires and whims that plague her. It has it from the inside. A dead person crying in a dream for a married woman. Seeing death or death
